articles.title: The Cathay Cineplex in Handy Road, one of Singapore's oldest cinemas, to close after June 26 - The Straits Times
articles.description:
The closure is "part of the cost rationalisation process for its cinema operations", said mm2 Asia, which runs the Cathay Cineplexes chain in Singapore.
 Read more at straitstimes.com.
articles.content: SINGAPORE - The Cathay Cineplex in Handy Road, one of Singapores oldest cinemas, will cease operations from June 27 and taking over the space is a pop-up by independent cinema operator The Projector.… [+2155 chars]

articles.description: BANDAR SERI BEGAWAN (Borneo Bulletin/Asia News Network): Sultan Hassanal Bolkiah bid farewell to 650 soldiers and family members from the 2nd Battalion, Royal Gurkha Rifles (2RGR) at their base in Seria, Belait District on Tuesday (June 14).
